name: Chroma (itch) (Studio FF)
description:
Chroma is short point and click game in which you experience change in perception of world without color.

As this artist you will be drawn into exploring this black and white apartment always with something to look at, hear or interact with. Along a puzzle and amazing music by talented Rafael Garaj ( Go check him! ) you will have rich experience.


All assets were made by using Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop and were animated in Unity engine. But i also use some textures i took picture of or my sketches as paintings on the wall.


My inspirations would be games from Amanita Design, Night in the Woods or Mutazione. 

Game was made as my term project on Gameart. I was learning everything during a process. That means from a early prototypes and ideas (that were changing a lot during whole process) to numerous obstacles during development. And finally typing these words presenting my truly first video game i have ever made!

I'm grateful what i have learned and excited about future projects or possibility to add some more stuff or even story extensions for Chroma! So let me know in the comment section and follow Studio FF on socials: 

  • Itch.io
  • Instagram
  • Twitter

Big thanks to my wonderful teachers, supportive family, friends and to you for finding my page!
